meta.name: Automate Meeting Minutes Distribution with Google Sheets and Gmail

parameters.content:
## Required


- Google account Gmail
- Google Sheet

## 1.Workflow trigger et data gathering

Trigger: Manual Trigger : run the workflow after you finish writing the meeting minutes and you’re ready to send them.

Nodes involved:

- Manual Trigger → starts the workflow

- Google Sheets (Read) → pulls the minutes from your sheet

Google Sheet requirements:

- Required columns: Topic, Status, Owner, Next Step

Setup:

- Select the Spreadsheet and Tab (e.g., Meeting Minutes).

- Enable Use first row as header.

- Ensure column names match exactly (spelling/case).

Tip:
- If you later want automation, replace Manual Trigger with a Schedule (daily/weekly).

## 2. Send the email

Purpose: Build the meeting-minutes message from your sheet data and send it to the right recipients.

Nodes involved:

- Code (Function) → formats content (HTML) and subject line

- Gmail → sends the email

Setup (Code node)
- Use this snippet to generate a subject, HTML body, and recipients from your sheet rows/columns:

- Setup (Gmail node)

- Credentials: select your Gmail OAuth credential


Validation
- Send a test email to yourself first
- Check that all required columns (Topic, Status, Owner, Next Step) appear and render correctly
